member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.NumberingFieldsPrecisionLevel
member.summary: Specifies the precision level for updating page numbering fields during PDF export, balancing accuracy against resource usage.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.NumberingFieldsPrecisionLevel.Normal
member.summary: Updates numbering fields once without re-measuring layout shifts caused by new values, matching Microsoft Word behavior. Choose High precision if field value changes affect document layout.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.NumberingFieldsPrecisionLevel.High
member.summary: Updates numbering fields iteratively until values stabilize with layout re-measurement, ensuring accuracy at the cost of increased processing time and memory.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.PdfExportSettings
member.summary: Configures options for exporting flow documents to PDF, including numbering field precision and extensibility hooks for custom formatting.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.PdfExportSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.PdfExportSettings.ExtensibilityManager
member.summary: Gets the extensibility manager for registering custom numbering style converters used during PDF export.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.PdfExportSettings.NumberingFieldsPrecision
member.summary: Gets or sets the precision level for updating numbering fields, controlling the trade-off between accuracy and performance during PDF export.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Export.PdfExportSettings.Telerik#Windows#Documents#Fixed#FormatProviders#Pdf#ExceptionHandling#IOnExceptionEventRaiser#CanRaiseEvent
member.summary: Determines whether the object can raise an exception event.
member.returns: True if the object can raise an exception event; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider
member.summary: Exports flow documents to PDF format by converting them to fixed-layout documents; import is not supported.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.ExportSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the export settings that control numbering field precision and extensibility options during PDF generation.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.CanExport
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this format provider can export documents, which is always true for PDF.
member.value: The value indicating whether can export.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.CanImport
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this format provider can import documents, which is always false for PDF.
member.value: The value indicating whether can import.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets the file extensions supported by this provider, which includes .pdf only.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.ExportToFixedDocument(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.Model.RadFlowDocument)
member.summary: Converts the flow document to a fixed-layout document and returns the resulting RadFixedDocument.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.ExportToFixedDocument(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.Model.RadFlowDocument,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Converts the flow document to a fixed-layout document with a specified timeout and returns the resulting RadFixedDocument.
member.param: The timeout after which the operation will be cancelled.
member.exception: The exception that is thrown when timeout is less than -1 or greater than Int32.MaxValue. Note that this upper bound is more restrictive than TimeSpan.MaxValue.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.ExportOverride(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.Model.RadFlowDocument,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Exports the specified document.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.PdfFormatProvider.ExportOverride(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.Model.RadFlowDocument,System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Exports the specified document.
member.param: The cancellation token used to cancel the operation.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Utils.ExtensibilityManager
member.summary: Manages extensibility points for PDF export, enabling registration of custom numbering style converters for list formatting.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Utils.ExtensibilityManager.RegisterNumberingStyleConverter(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.Model.Lists.NumberingStyle,Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Utils.INumberingStyleConverter)
member.summary: Registers a custom converter for the specified numbering style, used to format list item numbers during PDF export.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Utils.INumberingStyleConverter
member.summary: Defines a converter that transforms numeric list item values into formatted text for custom numbering styles.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Utils.INumberingStyleConverter.ConvertNumberToText(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the specified number to its text representation according to the custom numbering style and returns the formatted string.
member.returns: The text representation of the given number.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.NumberingFieldsProvider
member.summary: Resolves page numbering field values and bookmark page references for flow documents, supporting custom numbering style converters.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.NumberingFieldsProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.NumberingFieldsProvider.RegisterNumberingStyleConverter(Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.Model.Lists.NumberingStyle,Telerik.Windows.Documents.Flow.FormatProviders.Pdf.Utils.INumberingStyleConverter)
member.summary: Registers a custom converter for the specified numbering style, applied when resolving page number field values.
